ComicInfo.Title: notes #40; The Year So Far; The End -- For Now!; I [Heart] the Library Sale!; My 24-Hour Comic (Sort Of!); Bye-Bye Daddy (Part 2); Death's a Bitch!; Matrimony, Teddy Bear Style
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 12:28:10. [CVDB164624] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:45:58. [Issue ID 170753]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wondering whether her late period means the beginning of menopause, Midge remembers the beginning of her menstruation itself
Roberta at the annual Friends of the Library book sale.
Roberta participates in the Cartoonists Northwest 24-Hour Comics Marathon.
Roberta's father dies; she reminisces about his life as a Disney artist, the funeral, the family Christmas party without him.
Carlo and Van, in San Francisco, decide to get married in the Mayor Newsome Valentine's Day spree; includes cameos of the artist and his husband in line at City Hall.
